top.description: The number of records displayed on a page.

orderBy.description:
The field by which the results are sorted. 

Supported fields:

* `riskLevel` - The risk level of the vulnerability. Allowed values: `high`, `medium`, `low`
* `firstDetectedDatetime` - The date and time when the vulnerability was first detected
* `lastDetectedDatetime` - The date and time when the vulnerability was last detected

Available keywords

* `desc` - Descending order

firstDetectedStartDateTime.description:
The start of the data retrieval time range, in ISO 8601 format.

 Note: firstDetectedStartDateTime time cannot exceed the previous 30 days.

firstDetectedEndDateTime.description:
The end of the data retrieval time range, in ISO 8601 format.

 Note: firstDetectedEndDateTime cannot be earlier than firstDetectedStartDateTime

lastDetectedStartDateTime.description:
The start of the data retrieval time range, in ISO 8601 format.

 Note: lastDetectedStartDateTime time cannot exceed the previous 30 days.

lastDetectedEndDateTime.description:
The end of the data retrieval time range, in ISO 8601 format.

 Note: lastDetectedEndDateTime cannot be earlier than lastDetectedStartDateTime

TMV1-Filter.description:
The filter for retrieving a subset of the image vulnerabilities list. Include this header in every request that generates paginated output.

Supported fields and operators:      

|Field |Description |Allowed values |
|------|------------|-----------------|
|`clusterType` |The type of cluster|`kubernetes`, `amazonecs`|
|`name`   |The name of the vulnerability |Any value |
|`clusterId` |The ID of the cluster |Any value |
|`imageId` |The  The ID of the container image |Any value |
|`riskLevel` |The risk level of the vulnerability |`high`, `medium`, `low` |

Supported operators:
* `eq` - Operator "equal to"
* `and` - Operator "and"
